channel.title: Land Colonization on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Land Colonization on RD's Blog

item.title: The Calmodulin-Fused Kinase (CFK) Family: A Major System Converting Calcium Signals into Protein Phosphorylation in Plants
item.description: Notes on a 2017 Scientific Reports study proposing the Calmodulin-Fused Kinase (CFK) family as the principal system for converting calcium signals to protein phosphorylation responses in plants, based on deep phylogenetic analysis tracing their evolutionary origins and functional diversification.
